title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.5 - Age minimum in steeplechase
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.5 - Age minimum in steeplechase

State Regulations

No horse shall run in a steeplechase until August 1st
of the year in which the horse is three years old, after which date the horse
shall be qualified to start in any race at a distance not exceeding two
miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4054.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
